item.title: El-Erian Says Whiplash In December Fed Rate Cut Expectations Is Stunning – Cites Four Key Factors, Including ‘Lame Duck Chair’
item.description: In a post on X, he described the volatility as atypical for the central bank, which traditionally aims for “predictability and stability.”

item.title: AMAZE AND LOFT 100 STUDIOS PARTNER TO BRING WORLD-CLASS LIVE PRODUCTION STUDIOS TO CREATORS
